Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory28.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Not that we don't trust Watanabe, Commandant, but you should at the very least notify us before you travel to Forsaken territory by yourself...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Pardon me, Commandant, but that was really unwise.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Hmph. Going there all by yourself without bringing anyone of us...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This call would have been your obituary just a few months ago!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I trust Watanabe.', 3: '14', 4: "Hey, hey, who's the commandant here?", 5: '14'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'So? What are the coordinates?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "We'll head over immediately. Commandant, please stay safe in the meanwhile.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We have to get to Commandant before Oasis retracts its dome.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Watanabe will keep Oasis safe, I'm sure.", 3: '20', 4: 'I know I can count on my squad!', 5: '21'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Doesn't matter how Oasis react—your safety is still our responsibility, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Now we're your squad, huh?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I've located Commandant's location... Massive Corrupted activity sighted in the area!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's go help the Forsaken for Commandant's sake.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But... what should we say if the people up top ask about it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leave that to me.', 3: '36', 4: "Relax. I'm the best at doing review reports.", 5: '36'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Monitor Corrupted signals at all times. Send reinforcement to A-1. Stay in position, C-3.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is that a new frame?', 3: '100', 4: 'Is the situation that bad that it requires this frame?', 5: '41'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Why the hell are you here? Get back!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Let me help you.', 3: '44', 4: "I'm here for the fireworks—I'm here to help you, duh!", 5: '44'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'How is an unarmed human going to help?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So just get...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Corrupted on the west side are clear. No sign of them converging again.', 4: '2'}
